name: canister
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a firm container, usually made of metal and often round or cylinder-shaped, for holding food or chemicals: a small canister of curry powder a tea canister
Jennifer A Smith/Moment/Getty Images /GettyImages
a metal container, usually cylinder-shaped, for holding gases under pressure: The police fired tear gas canisters into the crowd. a canister of propane
hudiemm/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
a round or cylinder-shaped container for holding film: They found canisters of film from 1919. I mix my colours and then keep them in containers - I use film canisters.
Bet_Noire/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesArchaeologists discovered a Roman cosmetic cream in its original canister. I have a large canister of cocoa in the kitchen.Keep a canister of disinfecting wipes nearby.A single terrorist armed with a canister of toxins could kill millions.The lantern runs on almost any butane canister. A construction worker died when he unwittingly opened a canister of mustard gas left over from World War II.In his hands was a canister containing film shot high over Afghanistan.
